thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trade Groups Opposed to Trump’s Tariffs Seek Lessons in Travel-Ban Lawsuits

author: Bob Davis
title: Trade Groups Opposed to Trump’s Tariffs Seek Lessons in Travel-Ban Lawsuits
text:
WASHINGTON—Trade associations opposed to President Donald Trump’s tariffs are exploring whether to try to block the tariffs order in court, using as a template the successful efforts to challenge the president’s travel ban.
Legal scholars say the efforts face long odds in prevailing. President Trump is arguing that steel and aluminum imports threaten national security by battering industries upon which the military depends. Courts generally give the president wide latitude when it comes to national security, lawyers say, and... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
